Post.title: ES6
Post._content:
#### 
```javascript
function move({x = 0, y = 0} = {}) {
  return [x, y];
}

move({x: 3, y: 8}); // [3, 8]
move({x: 3}); // [3, 0]
move({}); // [0, 0]
move(); // [0, 0]
```
```javascript
function move({x, y} = { x: 0, y: 0 }) {
  return [x, y];
}

move({x: 3, y: 8}); // [3, 8]
move({x: 3}); // [3, undefined]
move({}); // [undefined, undefined]
move(); // [0, 0]
```

<!-- more -->

#### 
```javascript
let text = String.fromCodePoint(0x20BB7);

for (let i = 0; i < text.length; i++) {
  console.log(text[i]);
}
// " "
// " "

for (let i of text) {
  console.log(i);
}
// ""
```

#### (String)
##### includes(),startsWith()endsWith()
JavaScript indexOfES6 

- `includes(searchString[, position])`**
- `startsWith(searchString[, position])`**
- `endsWith(searchString[, position])`**

```javascript
let s = 'Hello world!';
s.startsWith('world', 6) // true
```

##### repeat(count)
`repeat`**n

Infinity
```javascript
'x'.repeat(3) // "xxx"
'hello'.repeat(2) // "hellohello"
'na'.repeat(0) // ""

'na'.repeat(2.9) // "nana"

'na'.repeat(Infinity)
// RangeError
'na'.repeat(-1)
// RangeError
```

 0 -1  00 -1 -0repeat 0
NaN 0

```javascript
'na'.repeat(-0.9) // ""
'na'.repeat(NaN) // ""
```


##### padStart()padEnd()
ES2017 
`targetLength``padString`
**
 - `padStart(targetLength [, padString])` ()()
 - `padEnd(targetLength [, padString])` ()()
 
 
 ```javascript
 'x'.padStart(4) // '   x'
 'x'.padEnd(4) // 'x   '
 ```
 
 ```javascript
 '1'.padStart(10, '0') // "0000000001"
 '12'.padStart(10, '0') // "0000000012"
 '123456'.padStart(10, '0') // "0000123456"
 ```
 ()
 ```javascript
 '12'.padStart(10, 'YYYY-MM-DD') // "YYYY-MM-12"
 '09-12'.padStart(10, 'YYYY-MM-DD') // "YYYY-09-12"
 ```
 ##### trimStart()trimEnd()
 ES2019 `trimStart()``trimEnd()``trim()``trimStart()``trimEnd()`
 **
 
  tab 
 
 `trimLeft()``trimStart()``trimRight()``trimEnd()`
 ##### matchAll()
 matchAll()()
 
 
 ##### 
 1. `Math.max()Math.min()`
ES6ES6

```
var values = [12, 15, 0, 20, -1];
var max = Math.max.apply(Math, values);// 20
```
ES6
ES6...,JavaScript
```
let values = [12, 15, 0, 20, -1];
let max1 = Math.max(...values);//20
let min1 = Math.min(...values);//-1
let max2 = Math.max(...values, 100)//100

```

##### padStart()padEnd()



```
let min1 = Math.min(...values);//-1

```

Post.title: First Blog
Post._content:
#### 1. node.jsnpm 2. git #### HEXO ``` $ npm install -g hexo-cli $ npm install hexo-server --save ``` #### ``` $ hexo init blog $ cd blog $ npm install $ hexo server ``` #### 1. github ``` cd blog git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/NewThemeName cd themes/NewThemeName git pull ``` 2. blog _config.yml theme: NewThemeName #### GitHub 1. github 2. Repository() 3. [^1] ``` .github.io ``` [^1]: github404github 4. git ``` git config --global user.name"Githubname" git config --global user.email"Github" ``` 5. blog, _config.ymlyour_usernamegithub ``` deploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/your_username/your_username.github.io.git branch: master ``` #### Github ``` $ hexo clean // (db.json) (public) $ hexo d -g // ``` #### hexo n "newFileName"*source/_posts*.md : hexo g github: hexo d #### *themes\hiker\layout\_partialcopyright.ejs* *copyright.ejs*, ```html
  • <%= __('copyright.author') %> <%= config.author%>
  • <%= __('copyright.link') %> <%- config.url %>/<%- post.path %>
  • <%= __('copyright.license_title') %> <%= __('copyright.left_license_content') %>CC BY-NC-ND 4.0 <%= __('copyright.right_license_content') %>
``` *themes\hiker\layout\_partial\article.ejs*,*donate*c*omment* ```html <% if (!index && theme.donate.enable){ %> <%- partial('donate') %> <% } %> <% if (!index && theme.copyright.enable){ %> <%- partial('copyright') %> <% } %> <% if (!index && post.comments && (theme.gentie_productKey || theme.duoshuo_shortname || theme.disqus_shortname || theme.uyan_uid || theme.wumii || theme.livere_shortname)){ %> <%- partial('comment') %> <% } %> ``` *themes\hiker\source\css\_partial\article.styl*, ```css .post-copyright { margin: 2em 0 0; padding: 0.5em 1em; border-left: 3px solid #FF1700; background-color: #F9F9F9; list-style: none; } .post-copyright li { line-height: 30px; } ``` *themes\hiker\languages*,,zh-TW, ```yml copyright: author: ": " link: ": " license_title: ": " left_license_content: ", " right_license_content: "!" ``` *themes\hiker\_config.yml*, ```yml # copyright: enable: true ``` #### markdown hexomarkdownGFMmarkdown hexo-renderer-markdown-it Markdown - Hexo Markdown - Markdown **** ``` npm un hexo-renderer-marked --save // Hexo Markdown npm i hexo-renderer-markdown-it --save // hexo-renderer-markdown-it ``` _config.yml ```yml # Markdown-it config markdown: render: html: true xhtmlOut: false breaks: true linkify: true typographer: true quotes: '' plugins: - markdown-it-abbr - markdown-it-footnote - markdown-it-ins - markdown-it-sub - markdown-it-sup anchors: level: 2 collisionSuffix: 'v' permalink: true permalinkClass: header-anchor permalinkSymbol: ```

--- title: First Blog tags: categories: HEXO --- #### 1. node.jsnpm 2. git #### HEXO ``` $ npm install -g hexo-cli $ npm install hexo-server --save ``` #### ``` $ hexo init blog $ cd blog $ npm install $ hexo server ``` #### 1. github ``` cd blog git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/NewThemeName cd themes/NewThemeName git pull ``` 2. blog _config.yml theme: NewThemeName #### GitHub 1. github 2. Repository() 3. [^1] ``` .github.io ``` [^1]: github404github 4. git ``` git config --global user.name"Githubname" git config --global user.email"Github" ``` 5. blog, _config.ymlyour_usernamegithub ``` deploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/your_username/your_username.github.io.git branch: master ``` #### Github ``` $ hexo clean // (db.json) (public) $ hexo d -g // ``` #### hexo n "newFileName"*source/_posts*.md : hexo g github: hexo d #### *themes\hiker\layout\_partialcopyright.ejs* *copyright.ejs*, ```html
  • <%= __('copyright.author') %> <%= config.author%>
  • <%= __('copyright.link') %> <%- config.url %>/<%- post.path %>
  • <%= __('copyright.license_title') %> <%= __('copyright.left_license_content') %>CC BY-NC-ND 4.0 <%= __('copyright.right_license_content') %>
``` *themes\hiker\layout\_partial\article.ejs*,*donate*c*omment* ```html <% if (!index && theme.donate.enable){ %> <%- partial('donate') %> <% } %> <% if (!index && theme.copyright.enable){ %> <%- partial('copyright') %> <% } %> <% if (!index && post.comments && (theme.gentie_productKey || theme.duoshuo_shortname || theme.disqus_shortname || theme.uyan_uid || theme.wumii || theme.livere_shortname)){ %> <%- partial('comment') %> <% } %> ``` *themes\hiker\source\css\_partial\article.styl*, ```css .post-copyright { margin: 2em 0 0; padding: 0.5em 1em; border-left: 3px solid #FF1700; background-color: #F9F9F9; list-style: none; } .post-copyright li { line-height: 30px; } ``` *themes\hiker\languages*,,zh-TW, ```yml copyright: author: ": " link: ": " license_title: ": " left_license_content: ", " right_license_content: "!" ``` *themes\hiker\_config.yml*, ```yml # copyright: enable: true ``` #### markdown hexomarkdownGFMmarkdown hexo-renderer-markdown-it Markdown - Hexo Markdown - Markdown **** ``` npm un hexo-renderer-marked --save // Hexo Markdown npm i hexo-renderer-markdown-it --save // hexo-renderer-markdown-it ``` _config.yml ```yml # Markdown-it config markdown: render: html: true xhtmlOut: false breaks: true linkify: true typographer: true quotes: '' plugins: - markdown-it-abbr - markdown-it-footnote - markdown-it-ins - markdown-it-sub - markdown-it-sup anchors: level: 2 collisionSuffix: 'v' permalink: true permalinkClass: header-anchor permalinkSymbol: ```

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```
<!-- more -->
More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

---
title: Hello World
categories: 
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```
<!-- more -->
More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

7 XSRF 
<!-- more -->
- vue-router
router.beforeEach(to,from,next)


- beforeRouteEnter`console.log(this)`
- vuebeforeRouteEnter()beforeRouteLeave()
```javascript
beforeRouteEnter(to, form, next){
	console.log(this) // undefined
	next(vm =>{
		console.log(vm) // vue
	})
}
```

Post._content: NextT, #### #### ```html text1111 text22222 ``` #### #### tag tag ```yml --- tags: // tag categories: HEXO // --- ``` #### *_config.yml* *post_asset_folder*true hexonpm install https://github.com/CodeFalling/hexo-asset-image --save hexo n "nnn" *_posts* #### *\themes\[themeName]\source\css\_custom\custom.styl*, #### nextT*hexo-symbols-count-time* ``` npm install hexo-symbols-count-time --save // hexo-symbols-count-time ``` **** *_config.yml* ```yml symbols_count_time: # symbols: true time: true # total_symbols: true total_time: true ``` ,[hexo-symbols-count-time](https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-symbols-count-time) ```yml symbols_count_time: separated_meta: true #| item_text_post: true #| item_text_total: false # Average Word Length (chars count in word) awl: 4 # Words Per Minute wpm: 275 ``` #### RSS #### (X #### live2d #### hexo-generator-index2hexo-generator-index ``` $ npm install hexo-generator-index2 --save $ npm uninstall hexo-generator-index --save ``` `_config.yml` ```yml # index2 generatorhexo-generator-indextrue index2_include_index: true index2_generator: per_page: 8 order_by: -date exclude: - tag hide - category hide ``` `exclude`:taghidecategory()hide [hexo-helper-live2d](https://github.com/EYHN/hexo-helper-live2d/blob/master/README.zh-CN.md)

Post.title: three.js
Post._content: D3three.jsthree.js ### vuethree.js 1three.js `npm install three` 2.npm `npm install three-orbit-controls` 3..obj.mtl `npm i --save three-obj-mtl-loader` 4. `npm i --save three-css2drender` 5three.js `import * as Three from three` https://blog.csdn.net/baidu_41601299/article/details/88663673 ** three.js[ stats.js ](https://github.com/mrdoob/stats.js), `npm install stats.js` : ~~PostProcessing [npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/postprocessing) `npm install three postprocessing`~~ **npm ```javascript import { Clock, PerspectiveCamera, Scene, WebGLRenderer } from "three"; import { BloomEffect, EffectComposer, EffectPass, RenderPass } from "postprocessing"; const composer = new EffectComposer(new WebGLRenderer()); // ``` *PostProcessing* ### First Demo ```html ``` ### three.jsscenecamerarenderer #### (scene) htmlnew `var scene = new THREE.Scene();` #### (camera) camera (camera)*(THREE.PerspectiveCamera)* PerspectiveCamera ```javascript PerspectiveCamera(fov, aspect, near, far) ``` `Fov`(int): `Aspect`(init): `Near`(int): `Far`(int): `var camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(75, window.innerWidth/window.innerHeight, 0.1, 1000);` #### renderer webecharts, web ```javascript var renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer(); // renderer.setSize(window.innerWidth, window.innerHeight); // document.body.appendChild(renderer.domElement); // domdom ``` ### ** ```javascript renderer.render( scene, camera, renderTarget, forceClear ) ``` `scene` `camera` `renderTarget`render `forceClear`autoClearfalse ### #### Heroes three.jsThings ``X ```javascript var line = new Three.Line(Geometry, Material );// , this.scene.add( line ); // ``` ##### Object three ****** () MaterialGeometry ##### Material() Materialthree.jsMaterial ShaderMaterial, ##### Geometry() thingsMaterialGeometryGeometry Geometry three.jsPlaneGeometryCircleBufferGeometry BoxGeometryTorusKnotGeometry ```javascript var geometry = new Three.PlaneGeometry( 5, 20, 32); // MeshPlaneGeometryMesh var material = new Three.MeshBasicMaterial( {color: 0xffff00, side: Three.DoubleSide} ); // Mesh,MeshBasicMaterial var planeDemo = new Three.Mesh( geometry, material );// Mesh this.scene.add( planeDemo ); ``` --- #### Lights three.js ------------- ------------- three.js ```javascript Var redLight = new THREE.Light(0xFF0000); // ``` THREE.Light ![](import-three/2.jpg) #### MeshLambertMaterial, ```javascript var geometry = new Three.BoxGeometry( 10,10,10);// var material = new Three.MeshLambertMaterial( { color:0xFFFF00} );// var mesh = new Three.Mesh( geometry,material); // var light = new Three.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 0.5);// light.position.set(0,0,1); scene.add(light); mesh.position.set(0,0,0); scene.add(mesh); this.renderer.render(scene, camera); ``` ![](import-three/3.jpg) ![](import-three/4.jpg) ``` var light = new Three.DirectionalLight(0xe20000, 0.5);/ ``` ![](import-three/5.jpg) #### ##### MMD three.js three.Texture three.Texture `THREE.Texture( image, mapping, wrapS, wrapT, magFilter, minFilter, format, type, anisotropy )` ```javascript var geometry = new THREE.PlaneGeometry( 500, 300, 1, 1 ) // geometry.vertices[0].uv = new THREE.Vector2(0,0);// uv, geometry.vertices[1].uv = new THREE.Vector2(1,0);// , geometry.vertices[2].uv = new THREE.Vector2(1,1);// 44 geometry.vertices[3].uv = new THREE.Vector2(0,1);// 44 // var texture = THREE.ImageUtils.loadTexture("textures/a.jpg",null,function(t){}); // nullgeometry // ttexture // ---------------------------------------------------------------------- var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map:texture}); var mesh = new THREE.Mesh( geometry,material ); scene.add( mesh ); ``` map ##### canvas canvas, canvas`THREE.Texture` `texture = new THREE.Texture( canvas);` needsUpdate `texture.needsUpdate = true;` `var material = new THREE.MeshBasicMaterial({map:texture});` ```javascript var mesh = new THREE.Mesh( geometry,material ); scene.add( mesh ); ``` canvas three.js`CanvasTexture``Texture``CanvasTexture``true``needsUpdate` ### PS three.js #### (OrbitControls) `Orbit controls`** . githubthree.jsjsmjs ```javascript import * as THREE from '../build/three.module.js'; import { OrbitControls } from './jsm/controls/OrbitControls.js'; import { EffectComposer } from './jsm/postprocessing/EffectComposer.js'; import { RenderPass } from './jsm/postprocessing/RenderPass.js'; import { ShaderPass } from './jsm/postprocessing/ShaderPass.js'; import { UnrealBloomPass } from './jsm/postprocessing/UnrealBloomPass.js'; ``` cameraOrbitControls ```javascript this.controls = new OrbitControls( this.camera, container ) ``` `OrbitControls``update``requestAnimationFrame()` ``` animate: function () { requestAnimationFrame(this.animate) this.controls.update(); this.renderer.render(this.scene, this.camera) }, ``` ### three.jswebGLcanvas #### three.js >[ materials / blending ](https://threejs.org/examples/?q=blending#webgl_materials_blending) [ > < ](https://techbrood.com/threejs/docs/#%E5%8F%82%E8%80%83%E6%89%8B%E5%86%8C/%E5%B8%B8%E9%87%8F(Constants)/%E8%87%AA%E5%AE%9A%E4%B9%89%E6%B7%B7%E5%90%88%E6%96%B9%E7%A8%8B(CustomBlendingEquation)) three.js `NoBlending`: z-bufferz-buffer `NormalBlending`z-buffer,, `AdditiveBlending`1RGB `SubtractiveBlending` `MultiplyBlending`RGBRGB ```javascript var material = new Three.PointsMaterial({ blending: Three.AdditiveBlending, }) ``` #### three.jsstats.js stats.jsthree.jsthree.js ### three.js three.js #### (UnrealBlooming) three.js examples[ webgl_postprocessing_unreal_bloom_selective ](https://threejs.org/examples/?q=bloo#webgl_postprocessing_unreal_bloom_selective) three.js #### dat.GUI dat.GUI GUI - [dat.GUIgitHub](https://github.com/dataarts/dat.gui) dat.GUI ```javascript import { GUI } from './jsm/libs/dat.gui.module.js'; var params = { exposure: 1, bloomStrength: 1.5, bloomThreshold: 0, bloomRadius: 0 }; var gui = new GUI(); gui.add( params, 'exposure', 0.1, 2 ).onChange( function ( value ) { renderer.toneMappingExposure = Math.pow( value, 4.0 ); } ); gui.add( params, 'bloomThreshold', 0.0, 1.0 ).onChange( function ( value ) { bloomPass.threshold = Number( value ); } ); gui.add( params, 'bloomStrength', 0.0, 3.0 ).onChange( function ( value ) { bloomPass.strength = Number( value ); } ); gui.add( params, 'bloomRadius', 0.0, 1.0 ).step( 0.01 ).onChange( function ( value ) { bloomPass.radius = Number( value ); } ); ``` ** ![GUI](import-three/1.jpg) #### Shader type typex-shader/x-vertexx-shader/x-fragmentHTMLjavascript ```html ```
